statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 5 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 5 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -25 \\ 15 \\ -12 \\ 16 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 5 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 5 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -25 \\ 15 \\ -12 \\ 16 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
